main event: A couple observed several unidentified flying objects in the sky over West Columbia, South Carolina on 11 May 1968.
interesting points: The couple reported seeing three round, bright lights in the sky,The lights were described as being the size of a quarter when viewed from the ground,The objects remained motionless for about 10 to 15 minutes before suddenly accelerating away,No sound was associated with the objects during the sighting,The Air Force was notified, but no further evidence was developed.
sighted object: three bright lights in the sky
witness description: a husband and wife returning home from shopping
